choices: See what Susan finds at the restaurant
Or the ever mysterious something else
1.content:
If your partial to quiet little town's, then their ain't a town quieter and more peaceful than 'ED'. A town so small it was just barely bigger than a village.

Hidden in the state of *bleep* and nestled in a ring of mountains and surrounded by a thick forest. Only one road goes into town and leaving means going back the way you came since the road stop's dead centre of town in a cul de sac.

Named after it's founder Edmund Alphonse Harrington the town was built in the early thirties and boasts a wide variety of things normally left out of such a qient community. A cinema as big as a multiplex, a zoo filled with exotic animal's, a massive school building as well as a five star restaurant, town hall, TV studio and a heck of a lot more.

The housing was their of course, like a tiny version of the new York suburbia with only a handful of houses all of which were of the right side of town while the stores, the zoo and other buildings were on the left.

Edmund had this vision that his tiny town of only a handful of people was just the foundation of a massive city easily rivalling the main metropolis of the country. He spared no expense in the town's construction, nor did he spare any on publicity.

After 5 years of constant construction, of hiring countless builder's, clerks and a wide variety of people to work and live in his town on march 19 1937 the town was officially complete. He then contacted every news station in the state, TV, paper's, radio. He had them all there at the town's ribbon cutting signifying it was now open to be shown in all it's glory.

It was a grand celebration, people celebrated from dusk til dawn that day, dancing, drinking and just about everything else you could think of that people considered 'partying' in 1937.

Harrington was ecstatic, the reporter's loved what they were seeing and guaranteed that they'd make this the tourist hotspot he desired. Soon his dream would be realised.

When the sun rose on March 20's......the town was deserted.

It was as if everyone had just stopped what they had been doing and just got up and left in the middle of the night. Food lay half eaten on the table's that had lined the town's street's for this day, cigarette's barely a quarter smoked still smouldered on the ground, radio's still playing static as someone tried to change the station but stopped.

Every one was just....gone.

=====71 years later=======

A SUV sat beside the pump of a fill up station, the owner of the car grumbling as the number's continued to climb and climb.

"Why did I agree to this?" The tall and reasonably muscled young man said grimly, he had blonde hair done in gelled spikes, wearing a giant's' jersey and black slacks.

"Cause *munch* you promised Lindsay, Allen." Smirked the passenger in the back seat watching him while flinging popcorn down her throat. She wore a lose black t-shirt with 'Jack Skellington' on it stretched over her substantial chest, she also had blonde hair but done in a bob cut and held in place with a pink hair band. She wore several small necklace's of varying neon and an arm warmer on her right wrist, she finished of her look with a pair of black cut off's.

"Shut up Su." Allen grumbled.

"Hey she's got a point..." Exclaimed the one in the front passenger seat, he was wearing a green and blue Hawaiian shirt over his slight frame, he had black done in a loose ponytail down to mid back, sickly green knee length shorts and badly beaten old sneaker's. He had one arm leaning out of the car and addressed his friend via the right mirror. "....Your driving from one end of the country to the other cause the girl your drooling for wanted to 'see America' on the way to Miami." He laughed a little.

"yeah yeah." He sighed as the number's 'still' continued to rise, 'freaking gas'.

"Well..." He said.

"Well what?" Susan said perkily.

"I know there's one more of you in there with a snide comment. Just say it and get it over with Barry."

The one he was addressing looked over his magazine for a moment before pulling it back up. "Nah I'm good.". Barry wore a button up shirt and jean's. He had his hair done in a short cut that was only a few inch's shy of being a crew cut.

Allen grunted at the comment while still watching the number's go up. Relief flooding him when they stopped.

$150.

"Why did I take dad's gas guzzler?" He moaned.

"Cause it was the only on that'd fit all of us." Barry said curtly while he still read.

Allen ignored him, he walked over to the attendant to pay the bill. He reached into his wallet to get the money.........if he had a wallet.

He gulped as he saw the expectant look on the attendant's face, his oil stained hand held out in a 'gimme' gesture.

"I uh...well you see." He stuttered.

"It's okay Allen I've got the money." His face lit up at the sound of his saviour's voice.

Walking towards them from the store across the street was Lindsay. She had long flowing fiery red hair that reached her well rounded behind which was clad in a white material skirt, wearing a dark pink blouse that his her reasonable 'asset's'. In both arm's she had a plastic shopping bag that looked fit to burst.

With considerable skill she pulled a wallet out of her skirt pocket and produced a hundred bill, two twenties and a ten. Handing them to the attendant who snatched them greedily.

“Sorry about taking your wallet. I didn't have much left after I bought those t-shirt at the world biggest rubber band ball.” Lindsay said perkily.

“No problem.” Allen said without hesitation.

“*Cou-whipped-gh*” Coughed Kenny, his front passenger.

Needless to say Allen was far more interested in the girl in front of him than his friends comment.

“Okay then I guess that means we can take off.” Said Allen as he turned to the car.

“Yeah.” Lindsay hummed. “I just wish there was a little more time to see any sight's.”

“Don't get your hope's up.” Said Barry, putting away his magazine. “Not much to see in *bleep*.”

“You folks lookin' for a sight.” Came an elderly voice. They all turned there head's to see an elderly man in a mechanic's uniform.

“Granpa not now.” Said the attendant next to them. “This is my granpa, he used to run the station a for he got to old. Still likes to dress up and play mechanic though.”

“Hush up boy!” He growled at the young man before turning back to the other's. “If you want sight's, there's a town bout 2 miles long the road, just turn right when you get to the sign that says 'ED'.

“Not that story again.” The grandson sighs.

“Ed.” Susan said with interest.

“Yup. 'ED' a genuine ghost town.” The old man said smugly.

Barry looked out with sceptic written all over his face. “Ghost town. Yeah right.”

“It's true. The ghost's of a thousand restless souls inhabit that town. Unchanged for over 70 years by the ravages of time.” He exclaims.

Allen turns back to the younger man for a better explanation.

“'ED' was supposed to be a town that'd put this area on the map. Had everything a big city normally has even with a town of only a few hundred.”

“Sounds nice.” Barry commented.

“Yeah. When it was done the builder, ya know the guy the town was named after. Invited all these media people to the town, there was a big party all day an' night. But when the sun came up the next day.....everyone was gone.”

“Gone?”

“Yup. Like they'd vanished into thin air. Now the entire town's supposed to be haunted. If you believe that sort of thing.” The attendant said casually.

Allen dared a look at Lindsey's face.

Her look said it all.

“What direction is it?”

======20 minutes later=======

Allen was hunched over the wheel as he drove down a barren and cracked backwoods road.

“Town coming up.” Said Kenny, his arm still out the window.

The group looked up to see the tiny town over the hill.

“Wow it really is tiny.” Said Susan.

Within a few minutes they past a large iron archway welcoming them to 'ED'. What the found strange was a large party banner under it displaying the towns grand opening. The banner still as sight and bright as the day it had been hung.

The drove to the centre of town and parked in the cul-de-sac. Other cars in various positions scattered the street, from parked to an old ford with the door's open and playing country western.

“This is....weird.” Said Barry, looking down over the table that was still brimming with partially eaten food. “You think their was a party here a while ago?”

“Well that guy did say that the town was 'frozen in time'. Maybe this stuffs been lying here for 70 YEAR'S.” Susan joked while she looked at the town with side way glances.

“Very funny. It's probably all just for show” Allen said. “Okay here's the plan. Wee only here for an hour then we leave kay. Now then we stick together and....”

“I'm going to the theatre.” Said Kenny. Taking off towards the move house.

“I saw a sign saying 'zoo' on the way in. I think I'll see what they kept here.” Exclaimed Barry going in the opposite direction.

“That restaurant has my name written all over it.” Said Susan before skipping off to the resterant with the 5 stars above it.

Allen looked at were his friends and sister had been a moment ago.

“I'll go with you.” Said Lindsay with a smile.

Allen smiled. “Anywhere in particular?” He said while offering an arm which she happily accepted.

“No not yet. I wanna have a look around first.” She said before the two walked off in a random direction.
1.title: Welcome to 'ED'

11.content:
'Maxwell theater'

It looked like any other movie house. The beight sign illuminated the name and listed the movies that were playing. The ticket counter was a tiny room with the two sets of double doors behind it.

Kenny walked up to it, moving past the ticket counter he noticed that all the posters for the movies looked to be in top shape, not even a little yellowed from the decades unkept. He shrugged thinking nothing more of it and went inside.

Wow!

A rich red carpet covered the entire floor and was devoid of any stains or gum. Their were four other doors (6 if you include bathrooms) each leading to a differant theater, and in dead center f the room like an island. The snack bar. warm popcorn jumping in the...

Wait....

He jumped over the counter. Looking at the old popcorn machine, still popping away kernals after more than 70 years.

He reached in slowly and latched onto a piece that jumped into his hand.

"Doesn't feel stale." After a second he popped it into his mouth.

"Mmm this tastes great." He said.

"Someone else is here." Kenny said in conclusion, no other explanation.

Well except one, but he didn't want to consider it.

Shrugging he scooped up a bag of popcorn and pulled a glass bottle of coke out of the chiller.

He looked over the movie titles over each screen.

"These movies don't exactly scream 1920's." He muttered to himself. They looked more like titles for cheesy 1950 and upwards b movie titles.

Finally he selected his film and went into the theater with the title above it saying...
11.title: Follow Kenny at the movies

choices: The two step through the screen and head towards him
He's pulled through the screen into the movie
111.content:
He walked through the doors to his selected theatre.

He was surprised to see a good sized theatre for a building this size, it was twenty seats long and twelve in length, the screen was about the same size as a modern on for any other local cinema.

He tottered along the suspiciously ungummed floor til he was in centre row centre. First row always made you bend your neck right back and made it hard to watch the movie.

It was like magic that as soon as he parked himself down a light shoot for the projection room and making the movie appear, dramatic music starting up.

On screen was a typical old horror movie title, the words 'Night of the zombie bimbos' flashed across the screen dripping with what looked like slime while the movie started in the background, focusing in on the island of Hawaii like from a satellite view.

The picture began to focus in more and more until we see a beach on the island paradise, the beach was quite active. Guy's and girls in their teens enjoying themselves on the backdrop of a setting sun.

The first thing Kenny noticed was how they were dressed. The girls would looked like they'd be more naked wearing normal cloths and the guy's didn't look much better since they're suits were the old prisoner stripped unitards. These were definitely 20 style cloths, back when showing anything above the ankle could get you arrested for indecent exposure.

The camera panned over the entire scene slowly, allowing Kenny to see all what a 20's teen considered fun.

'My grandpa has more fun than this.' He thought dryly 'And he used to be Amish!'

The camera then focus's in on one particular teenage boy at the end of the beach, staring at all the happy couples enjoying themselves. With a heavy sigh he leaves them to their devices and ambles away.

He's not the most attractive guy you'd ever met, but hardly a bad catch for any girl. Not handsome but hardly ugly. Average in height and carrying a little paunch despite his diet and exercise.

As he wanders down the beach he hears an unusual sound.

*Mmmmm*

It sounded like a woman, doing something that was most likely inappropriate.

He headed towards the sound further down the beach. Finding the woman half out of the ocean.

“Madame.” He said hurrying over and picking her up. “Madame speak to..........”

He was rendered speechless at what he saw.

Past the mass of blonde curls was a woman far more stunning than any he'd ever seen. Deep blue eyes, candy apple cheeks and thick rosy lips.

*Mmmm*

That didn't sound very good......it sounded great, but the point was it wasn't a sound a well person made.

“You must have hurt your head or something.” The boy (lets call him Fredrick) said. “Let's stand up and get you somewhere.

Without hesitation she shot up.

*Whap*

Fredrick was knocked back onto his rear when something huge and soft uppercut his chin.

He was speechless.

He looked past the fact that she was curvier than a country road, looked past the twin bosoms like prize winning fruit, he even looked past the look of raw lust in the woman's eyes as she approached him.

Even Kenny out in the theatre ignored these things, he along with the actor in the film were to busy wondering how she managed to find a microkini in the twenties.

He was so stunned by her revealing state of dress that he didn't notice her approach him until she was in his lap, pressing herself against him.

He tried to move away but she held him tight with strength her 4 inch shorter frame betrayed.

“Maam please let go I..” He was silenced as the bimbo pressed her lips to his, effectively silencing him.

Fredrick melted into the kiss, falling back and letting the woman atop him put her full weight against him.

So he couldn't escape.

If he didn't notice before then it was to late to do so now as something unknown moved from her lips to his, colouring them a darker shade of red as they grew puffier to match hers. The chemicals spread throughout his body numbing him to everything that was to come.

His genitals inverted.

His body matched her in curves, his suit growing looser yet tighter.

Hair cascaded down to his/her inflated behind.

Her suit grew tight and outlined her new assets perfectly.

Her face rearranged to met the same type of build as the woman atop her, with a slightly smaller nose and rosier cheeks.

'Okay this is definitely not a twenties film.' thought Kenny, who was clearly weirded out by the un nessicarily graphic change he'd just wittiest rather than a simple fade out/ fade in bit like they used in so many twilight zone episodes.

The blonde got off her new sister and seemed to look upon her handiwork, or would have if see had any mind to use to appreciate her work.

The woman who was Fredrick also stood up, her cloths quickly morphing into a v cut one piece. Her mind already numbed from the change it was all to quick as practically all knowledge drained out of her head like a leaky pipe, her eyes growing blanker and blanker until all that was left was a moaning husk of a human being.

*Mmmm*

The two held onto each other for a moment, seeming to enjoy the closeness before they shambled along the beach, their empty eyes looking upon the target and their lips puckered.

The weird thing was, the way the camera took a front view rather than a back one. Made it look to Kenny that the girls weren't heading towards the other beach goer's. The way they seemed to stare right at him....

...They looked like they were coming at him
111.title: "night of the zombie bimbos."

choices: Kenny is pulled into the movie
112.content:
He walked through the doors to his selected theatre.

He was surprised to see a good sized theatre for a building this size, it was twenty seats long and twelve in length, the screen was about the same size as a modern on for any other local cinema.

He tottered along the suspiciously ungummed floor til he was in centre row centre. First row always made you bend your neck right back and made it hard to watch the movie.

It was like magic that as soon as he parked himself down a light shoot for the projection room and making the movie appear, dramatic music starting up.

A woman ran through the woods full tilt, her skirt hiked up to stop helf from tripping as she jumped past bush's and tree root.

She was a rather well fed young woman, at least twice the size for what is healthy for a girl in their twenties. Her cloth's looked like they were strainging over her bopdy like they had once fit her with now no longer being the case

She kept looking behind her checking to see if whatever ghastly monstrousity that was chasing her still was. It was tanks to one of these checks that she failed to notice one particularly nasty root jutting ou of the ground.

"Agh!" She yelped efore crashing to the ground.

Almost immediatly tried to pull herself to her feet, ignoring the jabbing sensation of a twisted ankle.

Thats when she knew she was caught.

A huge meaty hand clamped down on her shoulder, its grip like a vice.

"There you are deary." Came a sickenly sweet voice.

The girl tried to pull away, but the hands owner, a rather plump old woman I might add did not budge an inch.

"Let's go back, you've still got quite a bit to eat."

With effortless ease the older woman began pulling the girl back in the direction she ran from.

"After all, your still far to skinny for my, Mmmmm 'Taste'" The woman licked her lips.

The camera panned up to the sky and the title 'Skin nd Bones' appeared.

Kenny munched on some popcorn. "This'll be good."
112.title: "skin and bones."

choices: An old women comes and sits down near him
Kenny realizes the change in popcorn and drink.
1121.content:
Kenny munches away on the pop corn following the movie best he can. It is jumping around a lot but it keeps going back to the old women and the girl she is fattening up to eat. Kenny normally isn't into movies like this but this has him hooked. He watches as the girl eats and eats. Kenny not knowing it starts eating faster, but the popcorn never grows empty. In fact it turns into carmal corn with lots of butter on it and Kenny keeps right on eating. He then says aloud, "I wish I had something to drink."

A super large coke is in the holder next to him. "Ohh.. score for me." Kenny takes a gulp, "Uh I wish it was a chocolate shake. That is what I am craving."

It changes into a shake and Kenny is none the wiser. He keeps right on eating and drinking, but neither ever grow empty.
1121.title: The movie continues

choices: ...A 400lb gut staring back up at him
11211.content:
As Kenny watched the movie he continued to shovel his food and guzzle his drink, never noticing that neither were getting any smaller. If anything he was getting bigger, not that he noticed that either.

He didn't notice that his stomach was starting to push outwards, surging foward in sync with the shots of the witch's victim growing along with him.

He didn't feel his thighs start to press against each other, or his chin start to hang down reaching for his slowly swelling upper body.

More and more he grew, totally ignoring his plight in favour of the woman in the movie that the witch was sucessfully preparing for a future meal. Partly because he was really enjoying the movie, partly because the food was controlling his senses, and partly because unlike other situations like this his cloths were actually growing along with him.

He didn't know how long he had been sitting their. Watching in rapt fascination as the woman soon became a massive heffer. Almost completly helpless and unable to stop the witch as she was put on a massive turkey tray, bare naked and carted towards a gigantic oven.

Kenny watched with baited breath as the woman struggled with all her might, the musci and the witch's laughter growing louder and louder until.....

*splat*

The cart holding her had buckled at the back, the jolt snapping the strainging bindings allowing her to slide back and crush the witch.

Kenny relaxed back in his seat as the woman got up. Panting heavily from the exertion but ok. She went over to a phone and called the police and ambulance to come and rescue her from the cabin in the middle of the woods. In the meantime the witch still had a large delicacy collection to go through, and her new girth had ensured that she was hungry!

The movie irised out to the woman continuing her gain on her own. Ending in a 'the end' followed by a '?' before the screen went dark.

Kenny shaked his head, as if he'd been out of it for the entire movie. Also noting that he no longer had any food to eat.

"Ah well." He said. "I better get going, the guys might be worried." He grabbed the arms of the chair that had expanded with him and stood up, only to crash back down.

"What the...?" He looked down to see what was wrong his his legs. Opening his eyes with horror to see.....
11211.title: Kenny starts to fatten.

choices: 4 gorgeous huge breasted babes with hunger in their eyes
4 ugly cliche witches with hunger in their eyes.
112111.content:
Kenny stared at the enormous mound of blubber where his flattering thinness used to be. Spilling out into his lap and into his knees.

He tried to jump up but found himself wedged into the seat. An ass like two beachballs had been blown up in his jeans saw that he wasn't moving for the next while. His venture to see his ass had also introduced him to his knew chin and rather unpleasent man boobs.


"What the hells happened to me?" He says while trying valiently to lift himself out with no success. "It's like that chick in the movie." He crashed back down into his seat.

"Wait BUTTER! I'll just rub some from the empty carton and...." He stared at the monster bucket of popped kernals in the seat next to him. Where the bucket should have been empty a full tub was standing, covered in fake butter and caramel.

His hand jammed itself in the tub and swung back up to his face wthout spilling one piece, every salty sweet trace of food went down his throat followed by another handful and another handful.

With the movie no longer on and the slow swelling from his piece at a time method of popcorn consumption to longer in play he could visibly see himself surging out the way. His cloths growing with him as his gut inched outwards, hid fingers thickening and his chin spreading.

"Oh good thank goodness I made it. Can't have our customer running out of snacks now can we?"

While not in control of some things Kenny was still in charge of everything that didn't involve grabbing food and eating with so he turned to face the one who did this to him.

"Sorry for this but its just your ou first patron in years and we really don't want to go just yet...."
112111.title: Apparently you 'can' have to much popcorn

choices: Kenny waches the movie. Swelling fatter with their approval
Kenny comes to his senses and tries to leave. How do the girls take it?
1121111.content:
Kenny was pretty sure there wasn't a red blooded male alive who hadn't at some point in their lives had this very fantasy.

Four, That's Four mind you, Of the....scratch that.

'The' four sexiest, most beautiful women he had ever seen, And likely will ever see in his life looked down at him from the aisles with 'OPEN LUST'. There wasn't a one among them who could be smaller than a Double D, Their wide hips and badonkadonk ass's swaying in a very deliberate manner as they move down through the seats to get to him. Oh jeez the wavy blonde just ran her tongue over her lips!

In moments they were all around him, giggling and pushing up against him with their lush bodies, Running there hands over his bulging belly and caressing his second and third chins.

“You weren't thinking about leaving after only one movie were you Kenny?” The red head with the G-cups whispered into his ear as she rubbed his shoulders, sending his pupils into the back of his skull. “We haven’t had a customer as handsome as you in forever. And we intend to 'milk' it for all its worth.”

The raven haired seductress pressing herself into his right side nodded before picking off a few stray kernels from his man boobs “Dropped some. Open up big guy.” She jokingly ordered before slowly pushing them under his nose, The second the smell hit he opened his mouth and she pushed them in, pushing them in just far enough that he ended up kissing her fingertips.

“Were, like, so glad you enjoy the food.” The ditzy brunette with the bowling balls stuffed under her shirt chirped. “We've got a 'ton' of that stuff just sitting around that needs to get eaten. So we , Like, hope you've got room for more.”

“Mmmm Full.” Kenny managed to moan out. The blonde and the raven haired women gently rubbing his over inflated belly softly and gingerly.

The blonde fixed him a wry grin and lifted his shake cup out of his hands. Leaning over his eyes rolled back to the front of his skull just in time to see an acre of cleavage fill his view. His eyes bulged as the straw brushed his mouth. He opened up and started drinking as reflexively as with the popcorn. His belly started to visibly expand before the girls hungry eyes. A line of drool escaped the red heads mouth as she saw him put on inch after inch to his glorious gut with every sip, The seat squeezing him tighter.

The three hugged him that much closer to feel the swelling against there persons. He'd put on another 20 pounds before the straw was drawn away.

“Doesn't look like your full.” The blonde said cheekily. Shaking the.....shake, making a heavy sloshing sound. “And it doesn’t sound like you've even touched this thing. So......” She pulled herself closer “How about staying for another movie or 2? We have plenty more snacks I'm sure a big boy like you can manage.”

Kenny. Basically now little more than a sea of adipose tissue, sugar and hormones could do little to form a proper response in the wake of a pair of melons dangling inch’s from his face. All he really could do was make a short strangled noise. Which of course the girls took as a yes.

“Good.” She stood up. “Linda...” She said looking at the Red head behind him “You go put in another movie. Becka...” It was the Brunette she turned to this time “Go fix Kenny here a snack tray. You know the one I mean.”

“You mean the one with the....”

“Yep. Anna. Go with her..”

“What about you Maria? What will you be doing?” Anna asked.

Maria smirked and plopped herself down in Anna's seat.

“Keeping our guest company of course.”

Anna glared but followed after her Brunette co worker.

Kenny gulped as Anna fixed him with what could only be described as 'Bedroom eyes' “Alone at last.” She said before putting her hands over her head and stretching. Making sure his eyes were fixed on her swelling bosom, Right before a button on her top shot off like a bullet and hit the screen, allowing him to see even more of her smooth cleavage.

Her arms came down and one went round behind his back, While the other went into his popcorn bucket, Like Maria before her she lifted some popcorn to his mouth and he scarfed it without thinking.

“I love a man who enjoys his food.” She whispered just as the room went dark. She guided his own swollen fingers back into the bucket were it resumed its piece by piece feeding, While she decided to be even more daring and placed her free hand against the parts of his swelling sides that were starting to flow over the arm rests.

"Well I am not.." Says Ken but stops when the young girl touches his arm. Ken feels a hot flash and the girls says, "Trust me sir. Oh and pleas ecome to the counter for all your movie treats. I am Lara and will see to it."

1153.title: May I help you? Ken hears from behind.

12.content:
'ED ZOO AND SAFARI ADVENTURE'

'Don't just see it. Live it.'


"Catchy." Barry deadpanned while reading the overhead sign at the entrance. Casually hopping over an old fashioned turn style and heading into the deceptively large zoo.

He overlooked the entrance secretly very impressed. Given the towns size he thought it would be more like a petting zoo, a dozen different animals at most and even then it would probably be things like racoon's and beavers.

The actual case was that Ed's zoo looked more like a big city type on that schools could take entire student bodies to all day without one class running into the other. Just standing here alone and looking out over the expanse he could see maybe 10 different sectors to this place with more beyond his line of site. With habitats that could easily hold whole groups of wild an exotic animals comfertably without ever having to worry about improper conditions or 'activists'.

Just before he continued onward he took a glance back at the entrance. The streets and houses still visible over the 10 space parking lot.

"Feels like a god damn Tardis or something." He muttered before heading into the zoo.

He jumped slightly when he heard the unmistakable sound of a lions roar in the distance. As if all at once the zoo came to life, the chattering of monkeys, the squak of birds and the rattle of cages sprung up all around him, like someone flipping on a switch.

"Ok someones fucking with me. Either this is a trick or......no no someones definitely fucking with me."

As wandered down the lane he came across a kiosk, full to the bring of old paper maps that looked like they'd just been printed, a map of the park itself painted onto the metal surface.

"Ok so were do I wanna go in 'Edsneyland'?" He snarked upon seeing the map, which really did look more like a bigger version of the map he'd last seen on his familys last trip to Florida.

On it were a number of different sections of the zoo, each holding a different species quite comfortably. After a few moments deliberation (which wasn't to hard considering he hated all the other animals) he picked
12.title: The 'You' Zoo

121.content:
It wasn't that much of a decision for Barry. He still refused to believe that such a tiny town could really have a zoo with actual exotic animals in it, let alone mammals who need a ton of space to move about freely. He went down the confusingly long paths past various houses holding different beasts.

He was getting more worried with every animal he past. Cages full of monkeys, Llamas and wolves to name a few.

"Ok this is officially getting weird. Where the hell are the zoo keepers?"

That was true as well. For as big as this place seemed there were no humans about keeping the animals well and fed. Almost as if.....

"Bullshit." He muttered just as he neared one particular display which caught his eye.

It was huge. Easily bigger than this place should actually have any scientific right to be. The animals below looked perfectly fine without a care in the world.

He found himself leaning forward on the guard rail blocking him from the massive terraformed pit. Just watching these amazing creatures move about and trying to wrap his head around how they could live like this without any humans.

"Careful sir. Or you'll fall in." A firm male voice came from behind him.

Barry jumped. Not used to having people around on his little tour he jolted from his perch against the rails. Which was all he needed to lose his balance and slip over them and go into the pit of.....
121.title: Lions and Tigers and Bears

choices: saiying "Help me., I am trapped here."
124.content:
Barry just liked watching the many fishes swimming from below the glass tank. It did not take long to walk down the slope to the benches. He did wonder how the fish were fed and how the tank was kept clean and purified. There were illustrations and a few words of tidbits about each fish there.

Barry did spot a couple of exotic fish too. He wondered how could that town afford it. He thought ' Surely there is somebody around here. This place is too well kept up. Surely that hot girl back in the last town could not have time to care for these fishes even if she ignored the other animals. The cool breeze was refreshing there at the aquarium.

As a joke, Barry tried to do an echo down there just for fun. Hey, there was supposedly nobody around.

HEY , he yelled.. Barry was pleased to hear an echo. So he said it again HEY...then a third time, HEY. After the third time and echo.. Barry heard something. He heard a voice
124.title: Fun With Fish

13.content:
'nous vous ferons le gras' 5 stars.

That's what the sign hanging over the building said in elequently styled french above the resterants stain glass double doors. A red carpet with tree's styled into cone shaped on either side of it led the way into tthe resterant.

Susan could really care less about the pleasent entrance. The walked briskly towards the door and shoved it open.

Smells unlike anything she'd ever encountered bombared her. Her tastebuds kicking into overdrive as she took a massive whiff of the delicous air. After a minute she stopped and continued toward. The inside was a pretty standard set up, Dozen's of large round tables with white embroided table cloths, each having several knives forks and spoons on it and a basket of flowers as a center piece. At the far end of the room was a stage holding instruments for an entire brass orchestra.

She made her way into the resterant when she heard a voice.

"Table for one?"

She whipped around at the waiters podium she just past andlooked with wide eye's. Standing their were a second ago no-one was, was a balding man with a ratty moustache wearing a white version of a butler's uniform.

"What the...how di....." She stuttered.

"If you wish to dine Madame I must first ask you to sign this." The waiter opened the book on the podium.

'Must be the customer register.' She thought before signing it under the few other names in the book.

"Follow me to your table madame." He said slowly before walking past her into the resterant, it was if he was almost gliding before leading her to a table dead center of the room. In a gentlemanly way he pulled out the chair for her to sit down in before pulling out a rather thin booklet.

"May I take your order?" He asked again in his slow manner.

Susan eyed him for a second before accepting the book and looking inside.

A second leter she closed the book, looked at either side of the booklet before opening it again. The reason being that is the same reason the book only has one page....With only a one item in it
13.title: If only she could read french

131.content:
jamais la fête de fin. $10.00

"Ah......why is their only this in here?" She asked pointing to it.

The waiter looked down to see what she was pointing at.

"We need no other meal Madame, in all the years we have been open , and no matter how many items we have in the book this is all they ever want." He droned.

"O....k then. I'll take it." She said handing back the menu.

"An excellent choice Madame. I'll be back in a moment with your meal." He said before walking/gliding though the doors at th other end of the room.

Susan just sat their in the empty room, getting bored quickly she started whisling and tapping her hands on the table to the beat of 'zelda'. This lasted for about five minutes bfore the room exploded into action.

The doors to the kitchen exploded as the waiter along with a few dozen other waiters came out. Each holding an enormous plate covered with a huge amount of food.

"Loberster Theradour."

"Sausage and potatoe."

"A whole fattened goose."

"Suckling pig."

"Etc."

"Etc."

"Etc."

They placed the plates down on the massive table which Susan was surprised to find did not buckle under the strain.

"Bon appitite Madame." The head witer said.

"Are you crazy. I can't eat all of this!" She shouted and grabbed the chair's arms to get up.

"You can and will." The waiter said plesantly before snapping his finger's.

Two metal bands shot out of the chair's arm's and bound her wrists, the same happened to her leg's.

"WHAT THE HECK!" She screamed as she fought against the restraints.

"Now eat." The waiter said as another waiter spooned up the mashed potatoes and held it to her mouth. Which Susan kept shut, another waiter came round behnd her and held her nose shut until she was forced to open her mouth which the waiter with the spoon took advantage of.

"Why *Gulp* are you *chomp* doing this." She begged.

"It was in the agreement you signed." The waiter said while pulling out the registry, he pointed to some words at the bottom that were so small that she had a harder time understanding them than the french.

"You agreed to remain on these premise and only leave when you could no longer do so under your own power." He said curtly.

"Mhp!!!" She gargled past a mouth full of pork.

"In lamen's term's madame. You agreed to remain here until you were morbidly obese." The waiter said before walking back to the podium and promplt fading away as soon as the book hit the podium, ignorant to the muffled protest's of the already fattening girl.
131.title: jamais la fête de fin (never ending feast)

Forget her, it's someone elses turn to eat.
1312.content:
"Thank you for coming Madame. We hope you'll come again." Said the head waiter as Susan passed his podium.

"Uh...Huh." She wheezed out through bloated cheek's

"Wealso hope you enjoy the complimentory transportation we have given you, what with you being unable to stand anymore. Adieu." He said before the doors opened allowing the girl to 'wheel' out.

In place of what had been a slim and stylish 'rocker' girl was now a blob of a woman. Her enormous stomach oozing out several feet in front of her and pressing heavily on her tree trunk sized leg's. Her breasts which her a firm D cup were now flabby HHH cup's and stretched jack's face like silly putty on her t-shirt which couldn't begin to hide her gargantuan gut.

Her arm's lay uselessly at her sides, too heavy to pick up. and her fingers and wrists were killing her from the jewelry that still adorned the sausage like fingers.

She had only two extra chin...but what chins! Her second on went for about several inchs past her original and actually sank into the third chin that used to be her 'neck. Her neck chin jutted out at least a foot or more out having the other two rest conferably on it, her cheeks so bloated that she could barely open her mouth.

She had a dazed look in her eyes as the wheelchair (which look more like a wheel 'couch') rolled her down the town streets. Like she'd just been medictaed and had no idea of what had happened to her.

The chair just trundled on with it's 800lb cargo. No-one pushing it and her not being able in any sense of the word to control it. It's destination known onto the th forces controlling it.

13122.content:
5 minutes after Susan left.

'nous vous ferons le gras' 5 stars.

Or in english

'We will make you fat' 5 stars

'Well whoever decided that name was banking on his customers not reading french.' Thought the surfer dude as he walked through the door to the resterant.

Unlike the previous victim, Kenny could actually speak french thanks to three years of the subject in high school. However just like the last victim he didn't pay much mind to it, I mean what harm could possibly come to him in a ghost town.

Well except that 'creepy' ass movie he'd just left. It was only a couple of shorts but the way the actors on the screen kept looking out towards the camera you'd think that they could see him or something, that's when he got out.

He walked up to the front door and gently pushed the door open.

*whistle* "Classy." He said out loud, admiring the expensivky decorated resterant.

"Thank you sir." Came a fake french voice behind him.

She turned around to face the waiters podium and an eyebrow raised behind his sunglass's at the sight of the fully decked out waiter eagerly waiting for his word's.

"Table for one?" The man asked.

Rather than be flustered Kenny pushed the man for answers.

"I'm sorry." The boy said. "But I thought this town was abandonned three quarters of a century ago.

"Oh it was sir." The waiter said politly. "However certain areas of interest are used as attractions for the public, other places include our zoo, movie house and several other places of interest."

"Oh." Kenny said simply.

"Now, would you like to dine here sir?"

Kenny bit his lip. "I dunno if I can afford to at in a place like this."

The waiter laughed politly. "The atmosphere is for nostalgia purposes only, the food costs as much as any roadside cafe."

Noticably realived Kenny nodded. "In that case I think I will have something to eat."

"If you wish to dine sir I must first ask you to sign this." The waiter opened the book on the podium.

'Must be the customer register.' He thought before signing it under the few other names in the book, he paused when he saw Susans name above where he signed.

"That's right, she did say she would come in here."

"Yes, and she throughly enjoyed her meal sir, as I'm sure you will, now please follow me to your table." He said slowly before guiding the boy into the reterant. it was if he was almost gliding to a table in the rooms center. He motioned towards the chair which Kenny pulled out and sat down on.

"May I take your order?" The waiter asked in his slow manner.

Kenny eyed him for a second before accepting the book and looking inside.

"Is this a joke?!" Kenny said annoyed.

"Pardon sir?" Asked the waiter confused

"There's only one item in here, and unless my french is wrong it says.....
13122.title: Hooray he actually speaks french

13123.title: Whers she going?

choices: Susan is fattened to the brink
131231.content:
The wheelchair squeaked and groaned as it ever so slowly inched along, metal scraping against metal as the wheels made each revolution, the chair heavily burdened by it's new occupant. Susan's face flushed a bright shade of crimson, her heart was racing and pumping so hard she could feel each beat in her ears. All while she drew the sharpest breaths she possibly could, in a feeble attempt to supply her beyond morbidly obese body with enough oxygen just for her to remain conscious.

"Huff... huff... wheeze... unngh...h-hun..." Susan trailed off. The sheer act of trying to communicate with her words had been smothered by her obesity. Her jaw felt so heavy, her lips felt so swollen and foreign to her. She felt her heart begin to race harder from her useless attempt at speaking, her face burned hotter, red blotches appeared an even darker shade spreading now onto her chest. Despite the immense weight of over 800lbs bearing down on Susan, her insides felt empty in her drugged and dazed state. If there was even a small chance whatever was moving her wheelchair would listen to her, she was determined to lead it where she wanted.

"Huff... wheeze... h-hun... gry." She forced out from her obscenely fat face. "F-feed... huff... huff... unngh... huff... wheeze... ne... eed... huff... huff...wheeze... f-foood." She barely managed to struggle out.

Susan's wheelchair slowly came to a stop, spun itself gently around, and began squealing loudly once more. The sharp noises carried across the whole town on the still air as the overburdened wheelchair began back up the street towards the restaurant.

Susan's mind was beginning to clear up as her slow and ponderous journey progressed. She became aware of her added flesh with each notch in the pavement, as gravity would bump and jostle her many dangling sacks of blubber that poured over all boundaries of her chair... or was it a couch? Just how fat was she? She wondered.

Her breathing was ragged, she had to maintain heaving breaths to stay alert, her resting heart rate felt like it was way beyond danger territory. Each heavy beat of her overburdened heart thudded hard in her ears, the world sounded strange. The simplest of movements were far beyond her now, her muscles would burn like fire before they would move her mass mere inches. And even more shocking to Susan, was the fact that she was on the absolute cusp of having the greatest orgasm of her life because of it.

The stained glass double doors of the restaurant gleamed as they opened automatically, allowing their obese former patron back on the red carpet leading into the lobby. Susan's wheelchair slowed as it approached the waiter dressed in white. He turned when he heard the forceful wheezing sounds that alerted him to the presence of the near formless woman.

"My goodness!" He said aghast, as he looked upon Susan's red bloated face. "Bring some amenities in here for our guest immediately!" The waiter shouted aloud. Soon more waiters seemed to float about silently, Susan could hear the sound of a machine priming itself behind her, as a cannula slid gently into her nose and began blasting cool refreshing oxygen for her helpless mound of a body to sustain itself on.

"There, that's better now isn't it?" He smiled. "We always take care of our customers, as I'm sure you well know. Now what might you be doing back in this fine establishment so soon?"

"Huff... wheeze... h-hungry... huff... unngh... huff... n-need... unngh... wheeze... f-fed." Susan managed to gasp and sputter out.

"After your last visit here madam, I must say I'm not entirely too surprised. That glint in your eyes as you ate..." The waiter paused as he leaned further into Susan's face, her eyes sunken from the size of her cheeks and her lips bulging out with fat into an odd pucker. "I'd say you were born for this. Just sign here please. You're aware of our only offering I'm sure..." He trailed off.

Susan struggled with her thoughts as the waiter placed a pen between her bloated fingers, there was no way she was enjoying this right? She heard a part of herself shouting in protest, but that rational part of her was silenced once the waiter finished jostling her softly sagging fat hand holding the pen against the register. Immediately once the register was signed the smell of food became readily apparent to Susan. Despite the feast she endured earlier she felt empty, she was hungry... no, she was starving.

The waiter led Susan into the dining room back to the same center table as before. Things were different now, there were no chairs. Just a single, heavy, ornately etched solid marble bench set low to the ground. The bench surrounded by a slew of medical equipment, tubing, and IV bags swinging leisurely overhead upon rolling stands. Susan's heart raced at the sight of these new additions. She wasn't doing this was she? She couldn't be enjoying truly letting herself for the first time in her life, could she?

More waiters surrounded Susan and grabbed her arms, others grabbed various bulges of sagging fat in an attempt to move her to onto the bench. The uneven fat folds of her legs were effortlessly supported as Susan rose. Her belly was lifted from both sides, the enormous cellulite-rippled sack of fat parallel to the ground. The darkened fat folds on her calves were lifted from the ground around her feet so Susan could heave with the help of the waiters to reach her destination. She took heaving gasps of oxygen and grunted loudly with each step, but eventually made it with the help from the eerie waitstaff.

Susan's body settled into a vast sloping mound on the wide bench, she continued to think as she caught her breath. This couldn't be, right? There's no reason she should be enjoying this, but as her eyes continued to stare down the various pieces of heavy-duty machinery and medical equipment, the only thing she could think about was that quickly mounting pleasure quaking between her blubbery thighs. She began to drool.

"I'm sure you're curious as to what those are," Says the waiter dismissively, as he shakes his head. "but you won't have to worry or think about any of that. In order for our customers to get the most out of their money, we use these to ensure their feasting continues for as long as possible. They'll make sure you don't give out on us too soon, so your unending feast can continue as long as possible. But enough of me talking, you have to start eating before this lovely spread goes cold. But don't worry, there will always be more... there's always more."

As the head waiter faded away once again with the registry, dozens of hands from congregating waiters began to grab forks and spoons loading them up with everything in sight and forcing them past Susan's near useless lips. Her cheeks bulged and her throat surged as she gulped feverishly to maintain their breakneck feeding pace.

With no other choice left to her, Susan continued to eat and suck down oxygen, as she experienced the best orgasm she ever had.

Before Susan can blink the meal arrives and it is a large chocolate sunday piled high with all the normal fixing and pickles and sardines. Susan says, "Oh that is disgusting! Please take...."

Susan stops speaking because the smell of the dish was so over powering and her stomach growled loudly. "Oh never mind what was I thinking."

"What is that madam?" The waiter asks as he empties the bottle onto the cake.

Susan is licking her lips at the cake ready to eat, "My mom, when she was alive, told me that when she was pregnant she crave hot sauce and chocolate cake."

The waiter smiles and says, "Wow. Isn't that strange..."

Susan

Susan feels a strong pressure in her belly. She looks down and sees here t-shirt push out. Her belly swells as does her tits grow, in ft she start gaining fat on her ass, hips and legs. Susan screams and starts crying, "OHhhhhhh. PLEASE Helllp meeeee. Uhhhhhhh!"

info.brief_description: Welcome to Ed. The most haunted town in the U.S.A
info.description:
Welcome to Ed, where every single square inch of town has more spirit's, ghost's and other general nasties than any other place in the world. No-one who enter's 'Ed' ever makes it out exactly the same way that they came in.

Please note that the interactive story is rated as such because of the free nature of a 'what if'. However here are a few guidlines that I would like you to follow. These guidelines are in place so everyone can enjoy the story.

**1. No gay or lesbian content.**

**2. No scenes of *EXTREME* graphically violent or hardcore sexual nature.**

**3. Try to write at 'least' one paragraph a chapter unless it's not supposed to be a chapter (i.e more choices)**

**4. When writing in the 'something else' paths please put a chapter before it explaining what your chapter is about and give the option of whether or not the reader wants to follow it ('would you like to follow this story path?' option 1 - yes, option 2 -something else)**

**5. You cannot kill any charecter's. You can torment, punish, transform, etc. These are all okay, but do not kill anyone.

Anyone who can make a good actual entry which is at least a paragraph long I will award an amount of GP based on the quality of the chapter with 100Gp being the minimum Options chapters not included.
